Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the creation of a statewide residential rental registry
Summary: Relates to the creation of a statewide residential rental registry providing information relating to rental units including the number and types of code violations issued by the appropriate enforcement agency, and the number of findings of harassment currently on record with the code enforcement agencies.
LawCode: Add ยง381-a, Exec L; amd ยง54-g, St Fin L; amd ยง307, Mult Res L; amd ยง328, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the state finance law, the multiple residence law and the multiple dwelling law, in relation to a statewide residential rental registry
